Name: Vanguard
Details: EXPERTISE: Tactics A Master Tactician able to move earlier than other units and who enjoys more precision when taking Called Shot opportunities. Effective at spotting targets via Sensor Lock and taking better advantage of indirect fire opportunities. Weapon minimum ranges are also improved. SPECIALIZATION: Guts Capable of standing their ground more effectively through Bulwark and able to suffer additional injuries before being incapacitated. Can also better control recoil effects from weapons.
